metadata.description: Toxic is part of a series of works mapping the language of our times. Words are converted to ASCII values. These numerical values are assigned to edge lengths to create an origami mapping of the word. The resulting image is produced from a repeated layering and displacement of the origami folding pattern.
metadata.title: Toxic
metadata.zip package: high res image and origami pattern
metadata.subtitle: from ASCII to origami
metadata.name: Toxic
